S

scrap(Document, String) - Method in class hac.BasicScrapper
the scrap function, which used to scrap data (a website) to a file. here it does nothing, but the "children" of this class used it (decorators).
scrap(Document, String) - Method in class hac.Decorator
the decorating function, used to "travel" between the "decorations" of the basic scrapper
scrap(Document, String) - Method in class hac.h1Titles
for each h1 element in the html, print it to the file
scrap(Document, String) - Method in class hac.Images
for each image element in the html, print its link to the file
scrap(Document, String) - Method in class hac.Links
for each image element in the html, print its link to the file
scrap(Document, String) - Method in interface hac.Scrapper
the scrap function, which used to scrap data (a website) to a file.
Scrapper - Interface in hac
This is an interface which used for scrapping data from sites.
